sm knit to end of instep knit in pattern to end of round repeats rounds 3 and 4 until there are 6 - 8 gusset stitches on either side of instep ending with round 4 a non-increase round the number of stitches you choose to add will depend on how high the instep is and how much more room is needed in that area of the instep work across instep then work a garter stitch shadow wrap short row heel or any other short row heel over 28 30 32 34 36 38 st on heel side see side note for a tidiness tip using a contrasting yarn row 1 rs knit 27 29 31 33 35 37 work ksw turn row 2 ws knit 26 28 30 32 34 36 work psw turn row 3 rs knit to one stitch before shadow wrapped stitch work psw turn row 4 ws knit to one stitch before shadow wrapped stitch work psw turn repeat last 2 row until you have 9 10 10 11 12 13 shadow wrapped stitches on each side and 10 10 12 12 12 12 center stitches if you need a wider heel work fewer short row if you need a narrower heel work more short row now for the second half row 1 rs knit across center heel stitches to first shadow wrapped stitch knit that twinned stitch as one stitch be careful you don t knit that as two stitches and end up making an increase work tksw and turn row 2 ws knit to first shadow wrapped stitch knit that twinned stitch as one stitch work tksw and turn row 3 rs knit across to the triplet stitch knit it as one stitch then work tksw in next shadow wrapped stitch and turn row 4 ws knit across to the triplet stitch knit it as one stitch then work tksw in next shadow wrapped stitch and turn repeat row 3 and 4 until there is one triplet stitch left on each side having just completed row 4 if using contrasting yarn cut it leaving a long tail for weaving in later and pick up your original yarn and knit across heel stitches including last triplet stitch on the left side note i usually knit the first couple of stitches tight and with both yarns held together to prevent holes ©2022 holly isaac for personal use only hollyisaac on
